article_title: Clinton and Sanders Escalate Sniping on Health-Care Taxes
article_text:
Democratic presidential contenders Hillary Clinton and Sen. Bernie Sanders for months have warily circled one another, contrasting their policy ideas in mostly gentle terms.

No more.

This week, Mrs. Clinton, the front-runner, unloaded on the Vermont senator, charging that Mr. Sanders would raise taxes on the middle class to pay for his...

twitter.description: Mrs. Clinton charges that Mr. Sanders would raise taxes on the middle class to pay for his single-payer health plan. His campaign says she is deliberately misleading people to divert attention from her Wall Street connections.
twitter.title: Clinton and Sanders Escalate Sniping on Health-Care Taxes

image.alt: Clinton and Sanders escalate their sniping on health-care taxes.

twitter.creator: @laurameckler
